'''Fine Enhancement Ore''' is an Enhancement Material for [[Weapons]] that provides 2,000 [[Weapon EXP]].

==Forging==
Two different recipes are available to forge Fine Enhancement Ore.

===White Iron Recipe===
The following recipe yields 1 Fine Enhancement Ore and up to 10 stacks can be ordered per forge queue slot. It shares the daily 300,000 [[Weapon EXP|Weapon Experience]] forging cap with [[Enhancement Ore]] and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]].
{{Recipe
|type = Forging
|time = 6s
|Mora = 10
|White Iron Chunk = 3
|sort = White Iron Chunk,Mora
}}

===Starsilver Recipe===
The following recipe yields 1 Fine Enhancement Ore and up to 10 stacks can be ordered per forge queue slot. It shares the daily 300,000 [[Weapon EXP|Weapon Experience]] forging cap with [[Enhancement Ore]] and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]].
{{Recipe
|type = Forging
|time = 6s
|Starsilver = 3
|Mora = 10
|sort = Starsilver,Mora
}}
{{clr}}
